entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
